name: physicalist.GitHub.io
tagline: Understanding the brain, one neuron at a time
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub Page.
Not much here to see yet.
My name's Jan and on GitHub I go under the moniker @physicalist. I dabble with computational neuroscience, that is to say modelling neurons. My goal here is to mainly contribute to open-source tools for neuroscientific simulation and data analysis.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
